title: Damon Lindelof Discusses ‘The Leftovers’ (144)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald are joined by the cocreator and showrunner of HBO’s 'The Leftovers' to discuss the ongoing shift in criticism of the show (2:05), the world-building from season to season (9:00), the Wu-Tang trampoline, and the first two episodes of Season 3 (35:20).

Disclosure: HBO is an initial investor in The Ringer.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
